TopicTitle: Custom flag on the OUTSIDE of the VAB

Articles.Content:
I think it'd look sharp if a large version of your flag was hanging from or painted on the side of the VAB, much like NASA's VAB.

The Space Center's flagpoles, while awesome, are tough to see from far away. This would give the space center a bit more of a custom feel. Perhaps hanging the flag vertically won't look good for every flag design, so maybe keep it horizontal.
